duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, design, and execute test cases and test scripts to validate trade and transaction reporting software applications.
Identify, document, and prioritize defects and issues using established defect tracking tools.
Ensure that trade and transaction reporting systems adhere to relevant industry regulations (e.g., Dodd-Frank, MiFID II) and internal compliance standards.
Continuously enhance testing methodologies, tools, and processes to streamline QA efforts and improve overall testing efficiency.

Work closely with cross-functional teams, including Business Analysts, Developers, Product Owners, and Compliance professionals, to ensure effective communication and understanding of QA requirements.
Contribute to status reports, test documentation, and project updates as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Finance, or related field
